Summary: 7 glowing red-orange lights , moving south to north over town.
divs: Sighting DetailsHad just arrived at the city auditorium for a concert and was waiting outside to enter, when I looked up to see the full moon to the north, to the right of the moon was a very bright star and stringing out from the star was a string of 5 orange lights. I called for my friend to come see the orange lights and she noticed that they were moving, slowly toward the north. We could see then that the orange lights were below the star. The lights were spaced evenly apart and moved slowly and in tandem. After a few moments of watching, the middle one "faded" out completely, and the others contiuned on their northerly pathway, and it was at this time we looked to the right (south) and saw two addtional orange lights. They all continued on their northerly path and each light faded out one by one in a random pattern. This was a busy night downtown and many people saw this phenomena. Our personal reactions were surprised, curious and wondering just "what the heck" just happened.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Eureka Springs
There were no other sightings in Eureka Springs on or around December 10th 2011
